name: Conference Project
description: A conference website for anime fans and comicon lovers. Built with HTML, CSS and JS.

name: TV Show App
description: A dynamic front-end website for TV shows information, enabling users to explore their favorite series.

name: Space Travelers Hub
description: A web application that fetches data from SpaceX API and display rocket, mission and dragon details.

name: Crypto Market App
description: A scalable front-end application providing real-time tracking of cryptocurrency prices and essential information.

name: Budget Buddy
description: A robust full-stack app enabling users to create categories and efficiently track their expenses.

name: House Rental App
description: A full-stack app that allows users to signup, see a list of houses, and reserve or manage reservations.
